name: get_utils
desc:
The get_utils library provides various utilities and extensions
extracted from the GetX package. These utilities facilitate common tasks
and platform-specific operations, making them easier to use and more accessible.

name: ContextExtensions
desc: Extension methods on BuildContext for enhanced media query and theme functionalities.

name: devicePixelRatio
desc: Returns the device pixel ratio of the current media query.

name: height
desc: Returns the height of the current media query.

name: heightTransformer
desc: Returns a portion of the height of the current media query.

name: iconColor
desc: Returns the color of icons in the current theme.

name: isDarkMode
desc: Checks if the current theme is dark mode.

name: isLandscape
desc: Checks if the device is in landscape mode.

name: isLargeTablet
desc: Checks if the shortest side of the screen is at least 720 pixels.

name: isPhone
desc: Checks if the shortest side of the screen is smaller than 600 pixels.

name: isPortrait
desc: Checks if the device is in portrait mode.

name: isSmallTablet
desc: Checks if the shortest side of the screen is at least 600 pixels.

name: isTablet
desc: Checks if the current device is a tablet.

name: mediaQuery
desc: Returns the media query data of the current context.

name: mediaQueryPadding
desc: Returns the padding of the current media query.

name: mediaQueryShortestSide
desc: Returns the shortest side of the media query's size.

name: mediaQuerySize
desc: Returns the size of the current media query.

name: mediaQueryViewInsets
desc: Returns the view insets of the current media query.

name: mediaQueryViewPadding
desc: Returns the view padding of the current media query.

name: orientation
desc: Returns the orientation of the current media query.

name: ratio
desc: Returns the ratio of height to width, considering optional reductions.

name: responsiveValue
desc: Returns a specific value based on the screen size.

name: showNavbar
desc: Checks if the width of the screen is larger than 800 pixels.

name: textScaleFactor
desc: Returns the text scale factor of the current media query.

name: textScaler
desc: Returns the text scaler of the current media query.

name: textTheme
desc: Returns the text theme of the current theme.

name: theme
desc: Returns the current theme data.

name: width
desc: Returns the width of the current media query.

name: widthTransformer
desc: Returns a portion of the width of the current media query.

name: GetDurationUtils
desc: Duration utilities.

name: delay
desc: Utility to delay some callback (or code execution).

name: GetDynamicUtils
desc: Extension on dynamic that provides utility methods for handling dynamic types.

name: isBlank
desc: Returns true if the value is considered blank according to GetUtils.

name: isNullOrBlank
desc: Returns true if the value is either null or blank according to GetUtils.

name: printError
desc: Prints an error message with the type of the value and additional information.

name: printInfo
desc: Prints an informational message with the type of the value and additional information.

name: GetNumUtils
desc: Extension on num that provides additional utility methods.

name: days
desc: Converts this number to a Duration in days.

name: delay
desc: Delays the execution of the given callback by this number of seconds.

name: hours
desc: Converts this number to a Duration in hours.

name: isEqual
desc: Checks if this number is equal to the given number b.

name: isGreaterThan
desc: Checks if this number is greater than the given number b.

name: isLowerThan
desc: Checks if this number is lower than the given number b.

name: milliseconds
desc: Converts this number to a Duration in milliseconds.

name: minutes
desc: Converts this number to a Duration in minutes.

name: seconds
desc: Converts this number to a Duration in seconds.

name: GetPlatform
desc: Utility class to provide platform-specific checks for both web and non-web applications.

name: isAndroid
desc: Checks if the current platform is Android.

name: isDesktop
desc: Checks if the current platform is a desktop platform (macOS, Windows, or Linux).

name: isFuchsia
desc: Checks if the current platform is Fuchsia.

name: isIOS
desc: Checks if the current platform is iOS.

name: isLinux
desc: Checks if the current platform is Linux.

name: isMacOS
desc: Checks if the current platform is macOS.

name: isMobile
desc: Checks if the current platform is mobile (iOS or Android).

name: isWeb
desc: Checks if the current platform is a web platform.

name: isWindows
desc: Checks if the current platform is Windows.

name: GetStringUtils
desc: Extension on String that provides additional utility methods for common string operations.

name: camelCase
desc: Converts the string to camelCase.

name: capitalize
desc: Returns a new string with the first letter capitalized.

name: capitalizeFirst
desc: Returns a new string with the first letter of each word capitalized.

name: createPath
desc: Creates a path by joining the string with the given segments.

name: isAPKFileName
desc: Checks if the string is a valid APK file name.

name: isAlphabetOnly
desc: Checks if the string contains only alphabetic characters.

name: isAudioFileName
desc: Checks if the string is a valid audio file name.

name: isBinary
desc: Checks if the string is binary.

name: isBool
desc: Checks if the string represents a boolean value.

name: isCNPJ
desc: Checks if the string is a valid Brazilian CNPJ number.

name: isCaseInsensitiveContains
desc: Checks if the string contains the substring b in a case-insensitive manner.

name: isCaseInsensitiveContainsAny
desc: Checks if the string contains any of the characters in the substring b in a case-insensitive manner.

name: isCpf
desc: Checks if the string is a valid Brazilian CPF number.

name: isCurrency
desc: Checks if the string is a valid currency format.

name: isDateTime
desc: Checks if the string is a valid date-time.

name: isDocumentFileName
desc: Checks if the string is a valid document file name.

name: isEmail
desc: Checks if the string is a valid email address.

name: isExcelFileName
desc: Checks if the string is a valid Excel file name.

name: isHTMLFileName
desc: Checks if the string is a valid HTML file name.

name: isHexadecimal
desc: Checks if the string is a hexadecimal value.

name: isIPv4
desc: Checks if the string is a valid IPv4 address.

name: isIPv6
desc: Checks if the string is a valid IPv6 address.

name: isImageFileName
desc: Checks if the string is a valid image file name.

name: isMD5
desc: Checks if the string is a valid MD5 hash.

name: isNum
desc: Checks if the string represents a numerical value.

name: isNumericOnly
desc: Checks if the string contains only numerical characters.

name: isPDFFileName
desc: Checks if the string is a valid PDF file name.

name: isPPTFileName
desc: Checks if the string is a valid PowerPoint file name.

name: isPalindrome
desc: Checks if the string is a palindrome.

name: isPassport
desc: Checks if the string is a valid passport number.

name: isPhoneNumber
desc: Checks if the string is a valid phone number.

name: isSHA1
desc: Checks if the string is a valid SHA1 hash.

name: isSHA256
desc: Checks if the string is a valid SHA256 hash.

name: isTxtFileName
desc: Checks if the string is a valid text file name.

name: isURL
desc: Checks if the string is a valid URL.

name: isVectorFileName
desc: Checks if the string is a valid vector file name.

name: isVideoFileName
desc: Checks if the string is a valid video file name.

name: numericOnly
desc: Returns a new string containing only the numeric characters from this string.

name: paramCase
desc: Converts the string to param-case.

name: removeAllWhitespace
desc: Returns a new string with all whitespace removed.

name: camelCase
desc:
Camelcase string
Example: your name => yourName

name: capitalize
desc:
Capitalize each word inside string
Example: your name => Your Name, your name => Your name

name: capitalizeFirst
desc:
Uppercase first letter inside string and let the others lowercase
Example: your name => Your name

name: hasCapitalletter
desc: Checks if string contains at least one Capital Letter

name: isAPK
desc: Checks if string is an apk file.

name: isAlphabetOnly
desc: Checks if string consist only Alphabet. (No Whitespace)

name: isAudio
desc: Checks if string is an audio file.

name: isBinary
desc: Checks if string is binary.

name: isBlank
desc: Checks if data is null or blank (empty or only contains whitespace).

name: isBool
desc: Checks if string is boolean.

name: isCaseInsensitiveContains
desc:
Checks if a contains b (Treating or interpreting upper- and lowercase
letters as being the same).

name: isCaseInsensitiveContainsAny
desc:
Checks if a contains b or b contains a (Treating or
interpreting upper- and lowercase letters as being the same).

name: isChm
desc: Checks if string is an chm file.

name: isCpf
desc: Checks if the cpf is valid.

name: isCurrency
desc: Checks if string is Currency.

name: isDateTime
desc: Checks if string is DateTime (UTC or Iso8601).

name: isEmail
desc: Checks if string is email.

name: isEqual
desc: Checks if num a EQUAL than num b.

name: isExcel
desc: Checks if string is an excel file.

name: isGreaterThan
desc: Checks if num a GREATER than num b.

name: isHTML
desc: Checks if string is an html file.

name: isHexadecimal
desc:
Checks if string is hexadecimal.
Example: HexColor => #12F

name: isIPv4
desc: Checks if string is IPv4.

name: isIPv6
desc: Checks if string is IPv6.

name: isImage
desc: Checks if string is an image file.

name: isLengthBetween
desc: Checks if length of data is BETWEEN minLength to maxLength.

name: isLengthEqualTo
desc: Checks if length of data is EQUAL to maxLength.

name: isLengthGreaterOrEqual
desc: Checks if length of data is GREATER OR EQUAL to maxLength.

name: isLengthGreaterThan
desc: Checks if length of data is GREATER than maxLength.

name: isLengthLessOrEqual
desc: Checks if length of data is LESS OR EQUAL to maxLength.

name: isLengthLessThan
desc: Checks if length of data is LESS than maxLength.

name: isLengthLowerOrEqual
desc: Checks if length of data is LOWER OR EQUAL to maxLength.

name: isLengthLowerThan
desc: Checks if length of data is LOWER than maxLength.

name: isLowerThan
desc: Checks if num a LOWER than num b.

name: isMD5
desc: Checks if string is MD5 hash.

name: isNull
desc: Checks if data is null.

name: isNullOrBlank
desc:
In dart2js (in flutter v1.17) a var by default is undefined.
Use this only if you are in version <- 1.17.
So we assure the null type in json convertions to avoid the
"value":value==null?null:value; someVar.nil will force the null type
if the var is null or undefined.
nil taken from ObjC just to have a shorter sintax.
Checks if data is null or blank (empty or only contains whitespace).

name: isNum
desc: Checks if string is int or double.

name: isNumericOnly
desc:
Checks if string consist only numeric.
Numeric only doesn't accepting "." which double data type have

name: isOneAKind
desc:
Checks if all data have same value.
Example: 111111 -> true, wwwww -> true, 1,1,1,1 -> true

name: isPDF
desc: Checks if string is an pdf file.

name: isPPT
desc: Checks if string is an powerpoint file.

name: isPalindrome
desc: Checks if string is Palindrom.

name: isPassport
desc: Checks if string is Passport No.

name: isPhoneNumber
desc: Checks if string is phone number.

name: isSHA1
desc: Checks if string is SHA1 hash.

name: isSHA256
desc: Checks if string is SHA256 hash.

name: isSSN
desc: Checks if string is SSN (Social Security Number).

name: isTxt
desc: Checks if string is an txt file.

name: isURL
desc: Checks if string is URL.

name: isUsername
desc: Checks if string is a valid username.

name: isVector
desc: Checks if string is a vector file.

name: isVideo
desc: Checks if string is an video file.

name: isWord
desc: Checks if string is an word file.

name: numericOnly
desc:
Extract numeric value of string
Example: OTP 12312 27/04/2020 => 1231227042020ÃŸ
If firstword only is true, then the example return is "12312"
(first found numeric word)

name: paramCase
desc: param-case

name: removeAllWhitespace
desc:
Remove all whitespace inside string
Example: your name => yourname

name: snakeCase
desc: snake_case

name: IterableExtensions
desc: Extension on Iterable that provides additional utility methods.

name: mapMany
desc:
Maps each element of the iterable to an iterable of type TRes
using the provided selector function and flattens the result.

name: Precision
desc:
Extension on double that provides a method to set the precision
to a specified number of fraction digits.

name: toPrecision
desc: Returns the number rounded to the specified number of fraction digits.

name: WidgetMarginX
desc: Extension on Widget to add margin functionality.

name: marginAll
desc: Wraps the widget with a Container widget with the same margin value for all sides.

name: marginOnly
desc: Wraps the widget with a Container widget with specific margin values for each side.

name: marginSymmetric
desc: Wraps the widget with a Container widget with different margin values for horizontal and vertical sides.

name: marginZero
desc: Wraps the widget with a Container widget with zero margin.

name: WidgetPaddingX
desc: Extension on Widget to add padding functionality.

name: paddingAll
desc: Wraps the widget with a Padding widget with the same padding value for all sides.

name: paddingOnly
desc: Wraps the widget with a Padding widget with specific padding values for each side.

name: paddingSymmetric
desc: Wraps the widget with a Padding widget with different padding values for horizontal and vertical sides.

name: paddingZero
desc: Wraps the widget with a Padding widget with zero padding.

name: WidgetSliverBoxX
desc: Extension on Widget to allow insertion into a CustomScrollView as a sliver.

name: sliverBox
desc: Wraps the widget with a SliverToBoxAdapter to be used inside a CustomScrollView.
